Package xxl.core.relational.cursors

The package provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes cursors.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Aggregator The aggregator computes aggregates like SUM, COUNT and VARIANCE for an input metadata cursor.
CrossTableCursor<D> This class computes the cross table of an input metadata cursor.
GroupAggregator The aggregator computes aggregates like SUM, COUNT and VARIANCE for a grouped input metadata cursor, i.e., an input cursor delivering groups (cursors) of input elements.
InputStreamMetaDataCursor This class constructs a metadata cursor for a given input stream, file or URL.
Mapper A Mapper invokes a given metadata mapping function on an input metadata cursor array.
MergeSorter A merge-sort implementation of a sort operator.
NestedLoopsDifference Operator computing the difference of two metadata cursors.
NestedLoopsDistinct A nested-loops implementation of the operator "Distinct".
NestedLoopsGrouper A nested-loops grouper is an implementation of the group operator.
NestedLoopsIntersection Operator that computes an intersection using the nested-loops paradigm.
NestedLoopsJoin A nested-loops implementation of a flexible join operator.
Orenstein Operator computing a spatial join with the method proposed by Jack Orenstein.
Orenstein.FloatPointKPEzCodeMapper Static inner class mapping a tuple containg a FloatPoint to a tuple containing a KPEzCode using Mappers.pointToKPEzCodeMappingFunction(float, int).
Projection Straight forward implementation of the operator projection.
Renaming Straight forward implementation of the operator renaming.
ResultSetMetaDataCursor This class wraps a result set to a metadata cursor.
Sampler The sampler is based on Sampler.
Selection Straight forward implementation of the operator selection.
SortBasedDifference Operator computing the difference of two sorted metadata cursors.
SortBasedDistinct A sort-based implementation of the operator "Distinct".
SortBasedDivision This class provides the division operator of the relational algebra.
SortBasedGrouper The sort-based grouper is an implementation of the group operator.
SortBasedIntersection An operator that computes an intersection using the sort-merge paradigm.
SortMergeJoin This class realizes a join operator based on the sort-merge paradigm.
SortMergeJoin.PredicateBasedSA<E> This class extends (@link SweepArea) and defines an inverse predicate.
Union Union is a straight forward implementation of the operator union.
 

Enum Summary
NestedLoopsJoin.Type An enumeration of constants specifing the join types supported by this class.
SortMergeJoin.Type An enumeration of constants specifing the join types supported by this class.
 

Package xxl.core.relational.cursors Description

The package provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes cursors. These cursors are needed for the implementation of the relational algebra operators.

XXL - eXtensible and fleXible Library

If you want to be informed on new versions of XXL you can subscribe to our mailing-list.

Questions or Bugs? Send us an Email: request@xxl-library.de
